title: Omega's Family - The Complete Series Bundle
description: This is the complete Omega's Family Series including:  Book 1: Omega's Suffocation Book 2: Omega's Family  Description:  Alex should be satisfied with life. He has a loving alpha and a baby on the way. But after being subjected to his alpha overprotecting him, they get into a fight. Worse yet, a vampire leader is planning to split them apart. Is Alex's life in danger?   *Disclaimer*: This book contains adult, sexually explicit content with an intense sex scene, male breeding and knotting and dominant alpha with his delicate rare omega.
